text: "One More Time, One More Chance" is a song by Japanese singer Masayoshi Yamazaki. It was released on January 22, 1997 on the Polydor Japan label. It reached No. 18 on Oricon weekly singles chart and was on the chart for 24 weeks. The song was used as a theme song in 1996 movie . Singer Yamazaki was one of the main actors in the movie. It was also later used as the ending theme song for the 2007 movie 5 Centimeters per Second. The song was released again on March 3 of that year under the label Nayutawave Records. This time it reentered the chart at No. 52. ==Track listing== All lyrics/music/vocals by Masayoshi Yamazaki ==Notes== ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Japanese music
